name: radioactivity_concentration_of_131I_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "I" means the element "iodine" and "131I" is the isotope "iodine-131" with a half-life of 8.07e+00 days.
